mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (customer_id, customer_name, email, password, phone_number, gender) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{gender})

INSERT INTO customer_address (customer_id, recipient_name, postal_code, address, address_details, recipient_phone_number, delivery_request, default_address) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{recipientName}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{addressDetails}, #{recipientPhoneNumber}, #{deliveryRequest}, #{defaultAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer_address SET recipient_name=#{recipientName}, postal_code=#{postalCode}, address=#{address}, address_details=#{addressDetails}, recipient_phone_number=#{recipientPhoneNumber}, delivery_request=#{deliveryRequest}, default_address=#{defaultAddress}
